metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8105 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in program/js/app.js in Roundcube webmail before 1.0.7 and 1.1.x before 1.1.3 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the file name in a drag-n-drop file upload.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.1.3+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.3+dfsg.1-1').
